did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: West Point Land Company Business Records, 1855-1878
did.origination: West Point Land Company (King William County, Va.)

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: West Point Land Company Business Records, 1855-1878. Local government records collection, King William County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in a transfer of records from King William County Circuit Court under the accession number 53658.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Volumes were used as exhibits in the chancery cause Richmond Bland, etc. vs Town of West Point heard in the Circuit Court of King William County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: West Point Land Company Business Records, 1855-1878, consist of a journal, ledger, and daybook that record the financial transactions of the West Point Land Company.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: For additional information see King William County Chancery Cause 1906-016, Richmond Bland, etc. vs Town of West Point. It can be found in the Chancery Records Index.
